name: Dustbuster Romance
description:
*Game is still in development, please be patient and wait for updates* Your love nest has been ruined by some maniacal scientist and you have to put everything back the way it was!

WASD - Movement.

To find the next abilities-search for useful stuff in the trash.
(In case we don't have time to implement the hints.)
Space - jump.
Lctrl - Dash.

The robot vacuum cleaner has had his beloved charging station stolen and is trying his best to get it back. He must avoid enemies and clear a path to his beloved.

/*The game was originally meant to be fully drawn, but the more time we spent discussing it, the less time we had for code. We had to cut about 60% of the content to get the game out on time, but we learned a valuable lesson about time management. We promise to finish the game before the end of the evaluation, please wait for the final result!*/
